website_summaries.verdict: Anyone who receives this super-soft, tall, and richly detailed Elsa plush won’t ever want to let it go.
pros: 18 inches tall, so a larger doll
cons: A little pricy, but it’s a high-end plush toy

customer_reviews.title: Three year old loves Elsa.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter immediately fell in love with Elsa. I, however, was both disappointed and angered in the packaging. The doll was not in the original box and was, instead, folded in half and wrapped in a plastic grocery-like bag, hand tied in a knot, much like I would throw out trash in. What was that!!??
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Clay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not the Elsa from the Disney store. She is much smaller and cheaper looking. Not the quality I was looking for. Returned and bought one from Disney for the same price much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jcoate

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, good for snuggles
customer_reviews.text: This has been a favorite since my 3-year-old received it. It’s very well made, holds up to lots of play, and is soft enough to snuggle at night. It’s better quality than a very similar Elsa I bought from a large chain store, which we returned after receiving this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old daughter LOVES her Anna and Elsa dolls. She sleeps with them every night! So far they are holding up & seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Noelleaopi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t very soft but I wasn’t expecting it to be. Got this for my little niece who loves anything Elsa and Anna and she loved it. Got it for her for Christmas and she’s taken it everywhere with her since. So really durable cause she’s a rowdy little girl!! Only thing I didn’t like was that it was kinda pricey for a kids doll that isn’t even soft.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: my niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 2 year old niece this for her birthday and she really loved it! I looked at some of the off brand ones and you can really tell the difference in quality. For a few more dollars, I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old daughter lost the first one my mother gave her and one night she happened to remember. I order this one and it arrived immediately, she was surprised and happy. It’s a little bigger than the original one she had so it’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter's 3rd birthday. She has just discovered Frozen and loves everything about it. Anna, Elsa, the music and the clothes. The doll is very cute and soft, she cuddles it at night when she sleeps. The only complaint I would have are the legs, not to scale for the rest of the doll. Just material that hangs there. But she loves it and thats what matters.
customer_reviews.author: pam m.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great stuffed doll but my daughters did not take to this doll
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Elsa
customer_reviews.text: My daughter carries Elsa around everywhere. Perfect size for a toddler and soft enough to sleep with! She wanted the original Elsa and this was the only place I could find it still!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality doll. It was worth the money. My daughter like to play with them. Anna and Elsa are the same height so it was good, because in my daughters mind Elsa couldn’t be shorter than Anna.
customer_reviews.author: Danya De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Legit doll
customer_reviews.text: The exact one I was looking for but cheaper than the Disney store or Walmart. My girls loved it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this doll!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She got canna and Olaf as well. BUT someone said they saw the exact same doll at the mall for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethStill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and matches the Ana I found at the thrift store. Now for all the other characters!
customer_reviews.author: MakkyZ and OAPV

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When we first got it I worried about it being durable and off but so far it has held up too extensive playing.
customer_reviews.author: timildeeps

customer_reviews.title: All-ages doll with no buttons to fall off.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all-ages Elsa doll that looks a lot like the character.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for a plush Disney doll. A little pricey, but I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Debit

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old carries her everywhere! Its adorable
customer_reviews.author: tammy turner

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE DOLL
customer_reviews.text: THE GIRL I GAVE IT AS A PRESENT LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good to get.
customer_reviews.text: Same as the Anna one I ordered. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Funny face
customer_reviews.text: The face was not properly made. Little girl still loved the doll. So I guess its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Matches the Anna doll we got at Disney on Ice, looks like a true Disney product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Made my 2-yr old niece very happy. Wish the face was embroidered, though, like Disney products typically have.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Official Disney Elsa
customer_reviews.text: Our Disney store had Anna, but not Elsa. This was perfect to finish the set and is an actual Disney plush.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and size for my 3 year old. She sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Reddstone

customer_reviews.title: Soft vs barbie
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Elsa fan, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleep's with this doll every night. Very cute and exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: SootsCrafting

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2 year old granddaughter and she loved it. She sleeps with it and takes it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Soft plush elsa
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this its perfect for toddler size and her features are softer more kid friendly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small, compared to other “medium” stuffed toys
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty, but I was expecting a bigger size Elsa, other than that my baby loves it but it is too small next to the Olaf we have
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Soto

customer_reviews.title: Hair Had Black Marks
customer_reviews.text: This doll came with black marks all over the blond "hair"
customer_reviews.author: Rose O

customer_reviews.title: Plush Elsa loved by 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My Daugherty loves this Elsa doll and it’s soft so she can sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little girls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps with this doll every night. It is very cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and durable! My 5 year old brings her everywhere and sleeps with her every night!!! Was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Billy stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my 2 year old daughter. Adorable, soft, and durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved her
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my 3 year old granddaughter and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amy O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Well made. Would order again. 4 year old loves to sleep with it. Competely plush.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

product_meta.title: Disney Elsa Plush Doll - Medium
product_meta.description: Our super-soft Elsa Plush Doll in her glittering cape, shimmering dress, and satin shoes will inspire wintry dreams of adventure.
feature_bullets: Sheer cape with sparkling snowflake design
Shimmering fabric dress with metallic flecks and bodice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
